Title: Resolutely expose and criticize the 'Gang of Four's' crimes of smothering the movie «The Builders» and negating the red banner of Daqing
Designer: Gu Pu (顾朴)Lin Kai (林锴)Wang Jiao (王角)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The "Builders" was loosely based on 'Iron Man' Wang Jinxi, the model worker of Daqing, the most famous oilfield in China during the Cultural Revolution era. The movie was surpressed by the Gang of Four (or Jiang Qing personally) for various political (and personal) reasons.
Theme: Gang of Four (四人帮)Jiang QingWang Jinxi
